ing: 1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
n: Summertime Crab Slaw with Napa Cabbage
des: "This cool and refreshing salad is a treat for the hot days of summer. Serve with red wine vinaigrette or dressing of choice."
ins: Mix crabmeat, cabbage, celery, radishes, olives, and green onions in a large mixing bowl until ingredients are evenly distributed.
